130430001.text: Special Deal! Spend 46,700,000 Alfalfa credits to enjoy a 12% discount on an additional item.

130430002.text: Discounted items include, but are not limited to: Jewelry, watches, bags, high-quality tailored clothing items, and more. Our distinguished customers are welcome to stop by and make a selection as they please when visiting the Oti Mall.

130430003.text: For detailed information regarding the sales event, please speak to the store manager Cocona.
